text: Lully is a municipality of the district of Broye, in the canton of Fribourg, Switzerland. On 1 January 2006, Lully incorporated the formerly independent municipalities of Bollion and Seiry.Nomenklaturen â€“ Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz accessed 4 April 2011 == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Municipalities in Broye
